content:

title: Google, Character.AI settle Florida mom's suit over son's suicide
description: Alphabet's Google and artificial-intelligence startup Character.AI have agreed to settle a lawsuit from a Florida woman who alleged a Character chatbot led to the suicide of her 14-year-old son, according to a Wednesday court filing.

title: The AI in your child’s backpack | Opinion
description: As a therapist and a parent, I’ve watched with unease as a growing number of apps now promise “therapy” or “companionship” through artificial intelligence.

title: Unearthing experimental materials data buried in scientific papers using LLMs
description: Technologies that underpin modern society, such as smartphones and automobiles, rely on a diverse range of functional materials. Materials scientists are therefore working to develop and improve new materials, but predicting material properties is no simple task. Data science is key to transforming this field, and new tools powered by artificial intelligence are expected to accelerate the exploration, collection, and management of materials property data worldwide.

title: Google, AI firm settle Florida mother's lawsuit over son's suicide
description: Alphabet's Google and artificial-intelligence startup Character.AI have agreed to settle a lawsuit from a Florida woman who alleged a Character chatbot led to the suicide of her 14-year-old son, according to a Wednesday court filing.
content:
The filing said the companies agreed to settle Megan Garcia's allegations that her son Sewell Setzer killed himself shortly after being encouraged by a Character.AI chatbot imitating "Game of Thrones" character Daenerys Targaryen.
